ul.li: This model is trained to recognize 2023 food dishes.\n
The training set includes entrees, side dishes, desserts, snacks, etc.\n\n
Do not use this model to determine whether an object is edible or not.\n
This model is not suitable for predicting the ingredients of a food dish.\n
Do not use this model to predict allergen or nutrition information.\n\n
This model assumes that its input image contains a well-cropped food dish.\n
If a non-food image is input to the model or if the dish is not well-cropped, the output of the model may be meaningless.
